name: Library
_source: # history of House Roland: once much more powerful --- kind of a force to be reckoned with until it was taken out by Vesner in his youth (much stronger before he grew obsessed with defying death and securing his legacy)
# Simon: maybe he's trying to live up to his ancestors' might by claiming more land?
# Anuki: makes a comment about how Simon's also trying to live up to his house's history
# * gets an item of some kind? like a ring for House Roland?
s;Simon;Huh. Roland must've been reading this book.
s;Simon;Looks like historical records of House Roland.{w} It says that House Roland was a dominant force long ago.{w} But much of their land was conquered by Vesner.
s;Anuki;This was probably before Vesner was preoccupied with trying to defy death then.{w}{br}But I guess that early conquest is why Vesner's territory is so big.
s;Simon;Well, this makes sense why Roland is so eager to claim more land.{w}{br}Maybe he's just trying to live up to his house's legacy.{w} Restore his house's honor and such.
